name: Dragon Rider (itch) (Dizzy Media)
description:
Face off against demons, gargoyles, golems and foes alike, in this fast paced, action packed fantasy shooter that will take you to another world, on the back of a dragon!

Features:

  • Fast Paced Action
  • Challenging Gameplay
  • Intuitive Controls
  • Tutorial Option
  • Easter Eggs

We made this small project in hopes to show other developers how easy it is to use our assets and make a cool game!

Assets Used To Make This Game:

  • Gaia
  • CTS
  • Pegasus
  • Ambient Sounds
  • Ambient Skies
  • GeNa 2

System Requirements:

  • Windows 7 & Up
  • 8GB RAM
  • 4GB VRAM
  • i5 or Later
  • GTX 1050i or Later
